detail.title: Back office
description: Refactor category creation and edition interface
Hide unsupported actions on unsuccessfully converted videos
Move sub-collections option to collection config tab
Fix PHP error on user deletion
Fix video saving with poster ou default enabled

detail.title: Front office
description: Implement TMDB search on front office
Add edit button on video page (#319)
Fix pagination on videos, collections & photos
Fix comments display on photos collection (#91)
Fix video upload max filesize check

detail.title: Miscellaneous
description: Fix old videos without quality specified

detail.title: Conversion
description: Add option to only keep maximum resolution

detail.title: Installation & Update
description: Stop migration on first error if occurs
Prevent SSE error on update from old version
Fix revision check when current revision is 0
Fix update status when working on new version
Fix dependancies check during installation process
